Process.title: From Concept to Conversion
Process.subtitle: A rigorous, proven methodology to transform your business operations.
Process.step1Desc: We dive deep into your workflows to pinpoint high-value automation opportunities.
Process.step2Desc: Our developers build your bespoke AI agent, training it on your specific data and brand voice.
Process.step3Desc: We integrate directly with your existing stack (WhatsApp, CRM, Website) with zero downtime.
Process.step4Desc: Continuous monitoring and fine-tuning ensures your AI gets smarter with every interaction.

About.subtitle: We build high-performance AI systems for companies in Qatar, Morocco, and worldwide.
About.storyP1: AI Operators builds high-performance AI systems for companies in Qatar, Morocco, and worldwide. We are a team of experienced engineers, data scientists, and business strategists dedicated to transforming how businesses operate through artificial intelligence.
About.storyP2: Our mission is to make advanced AI technology accessible to businesses of all sizes, helping them compete in an increasingly digital world. From startups to enterprises, we deliver solutions that drive real results.
About.missionDesc: To empower every business with intelligent automation tools that drive growth and efficiency.
About.visionDesc: A future where businesses operate at peak efficiency through the power of ethical and advanced AI.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how AI Operators ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and discloses your information when you use our website and AI services.
Privacy.section1Text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact support. This may include:

section1List.item1: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)
section1List.item3: Payment information (processed securely by our payment providers)
section1List.item4: Usage data (how you potentialy interact with our AI agents)

Privacy.section2Text: We use the information we collect to:

section2List.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our AI services
section2List.item2: Process transactions and send related information
section2List.item3: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
section2List.item4: Respond to your comments and questions
section2List.item5: Train our AI models (only using anonymized data where explicitly permitted)

Privacy.section3Text: We implement enterprise-grade security measures to protect your personal information. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
Privacy.section4Text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our AI services.
Terms.intro: By accessing or using AI Operators ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.
Terms.section1Text: You agree not to use the Service to:

section1List.item1: Generate harmful, fraudulent, or illegal content
section1List.item2: Violate the privacy or rights of others
section1List.item3: Reverse engineer the AI models or software
section1List.item4: Send unsolicited marketing messages (Spam) via our WhatsApp integration

Terms.section2Text: The Service and its original content (excluding content provided by you), features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of AI Operators and its licensors.
Terms.section3Text: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
Terms.section4Text: In no event shall AI Operators, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits.
Terms.section5Text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which AI Operators operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
